column5: There are no visa requirements for entry into Andorra but it can only be accessed by passing through France or Spain. A multiple entry visa is required to re-enter either France or Spain when leaving Andorra.
Visas are issued on arrival at the
Visa free for holders of valid visa for Schengen area or the US.
Electronic visa holders must arrive via

Pre-arranged visa can be obtained on arrival
No visa required for holders of valid US visas arriving from the US
Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply.
Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days for valid visa holders or residents of the
Visa may be obtained on arrival provided an invitation letter by the sponsor had been submitted to the authorities before arrival.
Electronic visa through specified airlines is available to passengers.
